page.title: 02ARTS & CRAFTS FORRES WEST
page.content: In Forres there is an institute called the Findhorn Foundation.This is a place where people from all over the world come and pay to stay there and be employed.It is quite an expensive place to stay at,so some who can afford it stay for a long time. The Findhorn Foundation has a small craft shop selling among other things small pieces of craft work made by the lodgers themselves. The grounds are picturesque and lovely especialy when summer comes round and the flowers bloom.The gardens are not private and are free for anyone to take a stroll through. The house surrounded by the beautiful gardens looks spectacular just visible over the wooded rise of Cluny Hill. Many people from other countries meet each other,find out about other places and make long,lasting friendships.
